RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 1 1 1/16M Dirt CR: 86. Claiming Purse 15400. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 2 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Prefe rred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ISTILLGOTIT was away alertly and quickly made the lead, led throughout and remained well clear while being ridden out. ALGORIX was never far back, rallied in the stretch, could not challenge the winner but was second best. PERFETTO chased the winner for six furlongs and weakened in the stretch. KRAMDEN contended early and tired on the far turn. GILES showed little and trailed.

ENTRY.COMMENT: contended early and tired on the far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Perfetto
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased the winner and weakened in the stretch

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 89. Claiming Purse 17700. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE OCTOBER 2. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 2 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CONTENT tracked three wide, rallied in the stretch, closed determinedly and edged clear late under firm handling. SHELLEY'S GEM dueled early, shook clear on the turn, remained clear in mid stretch and was caught late. SIERRA DIAMOND raced inside early, swung four wide in the stretch and had a mild bid. SPICE IT UP had good position on the inside and went evenly late. TAPALONG allowed to settle, failed to menace. CEVICHE raced four wide and was outrun.

ENTRY.COMMENT: had good position, on the inside and went evenly late

ENTRY.COMMENT: raced inside early, swung wide in the stretch and had a mild bid,

RACE.FOOTNOTES: THIS MAN CAN dueled early, shook clear on the turn, was well handled on the front end and lasted under under firm handling. JUDGE HEAD pressed the pace throughout,closed willingly and was up for place. BUCKEYE RUCKUS had good position on the inside and finished willingly in a good effort. REANIMATE tracked four wide and rallied,late. CAPTAIN RILEY allowed to settle, failed to menace. THE MAN CAN was allowed to settle early, swung wide in the stretch and was no menace. BLUE MONARCH raced wide and was outrun. CADILLAC RIDE pressed the pace for a half, then gave way in mid stretch.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 81. Claiming Purse 21500. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE AUGUST 2. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LITTLE BLAKER raced inside, steadied,three eight pole, awaited room on the turn, angled out four wide in the stretch, closed determinedly and drew clear late under firm handling. GOLDEN MONEY pressed the pace and dueled on the lead three wide, was outfiished late but was clearly second best. RONNI'S STORM dueled on the lead from the inside and weakened late. MIDNIGHT MIKEY dueled on the lead until late stretch and faltered. PRIVATE DRIVE steadied early on the inside and was no menace. HANSENATION settled early, swung wide and was no factor. DYNAMITE CLOUD pressed early and was through after a half.

ENTRY.COMMENT: steadied early on the inside and was no menace

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 76. Claiming Purse 21500. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 2 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $8,000 (Races Where Entered For $7,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MANNFORD pressed early, dueled on the lead three wide until mid stretch, drew clear late under firm handling. KISSINGER had good position early, rallied in the stretch on the inside, finished willingly and was second best. JACK BE FAST was never far back, rallied in the stretch four wide and finished well. ROLLIN ON TEQUILA set the early pace, dueled on the lead and weakened in mid stretch. BIG OHIO was unhurried early, saved ground and was no threat. DREAM PRIZES had brief foot, and was through after a half. IT'S A MANS WORLD was no factor. ROSCO P. COLTRANE broke in a tangle and lost his rider and walked off. The stewards posted the inquiry sign but took no action.

ENTRY.COMMENT: had brief foot, and was through after half,

ENTRY.COMMENT: had good position, early, rallied, in the stretch on the inside,

RACE.FOOTNOTES: FOREIGN dueled, on the lead the entire trip, prevailed late, gamely. OHIO CAUSE dueled with the winner throughout, held grudgingly and just missed. JOES A ROCKIN was never far back, rallied in the stretch on the inside and finished well. PLATE IT UP tracked three wide and finished willingly. C K'S LUCKY DUCK raced four wide and was no threat. JUST CHESTER pressed the pace on the inside and weakened in mid stretch. BOOT LEGGER raced four wide and was no threat.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 83. Claiming Purse 11100. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE FEBRUARY 2. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 2 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HARD N'SWEET stalked the pace for a half, rallied three wide to make the lead on the far turn, shook clear in upper stretch under left handed urging and prevailed by the narrowest of margins. KING ANDRES pressed the pace two wide into the stretch, dug in late and just missed. GET HAMMERED away alertly, set a pressured pace along the inside into the far turn then was outfinished. GOTSOMEMOJO failed to menace. AREYOUTALKINGTOME well placed, failed to respond. LOOKS GOOD N A TUX was no factor. GIZMO JONES was outrun. PIONEER DANCER was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Areyoutalkingtome
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed, failed to respond,

ENTRY.NAME: Hard n'Sweet
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, rallied 3 wide, shook clear, just lasted,

ENTRY.NAME: Get Hammered
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pressured pace 2nd turn, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Pioneer Dancer
ENTRY.COMMENT: through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: King Andres
ENTRY.OWNER: R and P Racing Stables, LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, dug in late, just missed,

ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 88. Allowance Purse 25900. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 2 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered F oals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BIG BAD BEAST never far back, shifted to the four path past the furlong marker, closed with a burst of speed and got up in time. SCRATCHOFF away alertly, set the pace into the stretch, shook clear before the eighth pole then couldn't handle the late charge of the winner. WICKED CHANCE trailed into the turn then had a mild late rally four wide. TONKAWA SPRINGS close up, dropped back on the turn then came on again late along the inside. NITROMAN pressed the pace two wide into the stretch and weakened late. R CARDINAL PRINCE went evenly. PRIVATE CONNIE stalked the pace along the inside for a half, shifted out to the five path then weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Big Bad Beast
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, shifted 4path, late burst, in time

ENTRY.NAME: Private Connie
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace inside, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Scratchoff
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, shook clear upper stretch, caught

ENTRY.COMMENT: mild rally late 4wide

ENTRY.NAME: Tonkawa Springs
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up, dropped back turn, came again inside,

ENTRY.NAME: Nitroman
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, weakened lane
